Hi Johannes,

Netbeans IDE has a module supporting generation and execution of
JUnit tests, see page at http://junit.netbeans.org .

Vita

john.link@... wrote:

> I'm currently compiling a list of open source and commercial software
> for unit testing (and support) in Java. The current contents:
>
> - JUnit and all extensions listed on the Junit web site
> - TestMentor from Silvermark
> - Jtest and Jcontract from Parasoft
> There's certainly more that I don't know of.
> Anyone knows anything else?
>
> Johannes
>
